text: As Nisl has no graphical identity for the moment, we left the scikit-learn layout for the documentation. Changing it is planned but, to avoid confusion, I suggest that we change at least the logo so that users can distinguish Nisl for scikit-learn.
title: Confusing documentation layout

text:
> As Nisl has no graphical identity for the moment, we left the scikit-learn
> layout for the documentation. Changing it is planned but, to avoid confusion, I
> suggest that we change at least the logo so that users can distinguish Nisl for
> scikit-learn.

Later. First we announce it on the Nipy mailing list. And to do this, we
need to fix a bunch of things (the APIs are not stable yet, for instance
the memory_level is missing).
